title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder shows old column names
description: Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder still shows old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: The original name of the first column is displayed below the expression builder, but the alias name appears as row['column1'] above the expression builder after double-clicking the original name.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the alias name 'column1' should be displayed instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and double-click the first column name.
